entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
